website_summaries.verdict: Being one of the silos in the Magista series, a lot is expected from the Nike Magista Obra II DF Pro FG. Indeed, the cleat’s comfort and performance passed the majority expectations. Many users were in awe of its snug fit and great traction. For players who are looking for an excellent cleat quality with likes of Magista Obra II DF Elite but on a relatively lower budget then this is the better choice.
pros: Many users have attested to the cleats comfort
they were impressed with the snug sensation that the synthetic leather offers

Several reviewers were glad that the cleat is not as expensive as the Magista Obra II DF Elite (formerly the Magista Orden II FG) but still delivers the same quality as the said silo in the same series
The stud pattern performance was described as excellent by some players as it provided them better rotational traction
Some players find the overall design to be stylish particularly the dimpled texture that is found in the upper
The second version of the Nike Magista Obra DF Pro FG had a great touch on the ball as told by some players
cons: A few reviews noted the tight grip of the synthetic leather to the socks that made the cleat uncomfortable to put on
A couple of players stated that Nike Magista Obra II DF Pro FG is not the best option for the wide-footed as it provided an extra snug feel overall
Some testers have experienced durability issues with the sole
It snapped after a few sessions, according to some players
Some users experienced painful blisters while breaking in with the Nike Magista Obra II DF Pro FG

customer_reviews.title: It is better than expected!🤗
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but it need a few changes like it beeds better color also it needs better socks thats on it also it beeds to be more styless lastley it needs to have better boxing
customer_reviews.author: amos j forsyth

customer_reviews.title: light weight and durable
customer_reviews.text: These have been great shoes for my kid who plays 4 days a week mostly on field turf! They are light weight and durable and lasted a year. This one is her second pair and even though it was not on prime, the shipping was about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: John Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Worst cleats I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: The cleats lasted 2 months before falling apart and they wouldn't let me get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same grey+light orange shoe I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Defective soccer shoe
customer_reviews.text: The toe blew out and the upper sock unraveled 45 days after purchase. 15 days past return limit. Now negotiating with Nike. A $270 shoe is professional grade but a 14 year old after two summer soccer camps wore them out. Do not buy Nike.
customer_reviews.author: david h. britton

customer_reviews.title: The color
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks and fits, its comfortable and flexible. A good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Darling

customer_reviews.title: I was warned this would happen
customer_reviews.text: Sole of shoe came apart , In less than 7mo. Too expensive to have this happen.
customer_reviews.author: John Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, but runs very small. We were not even able to get my son’s foot in the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for my son with these cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fine

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: High quality cleats as I expected. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleat. I have wide feet so towards the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleat. I have wide feet so towards the end of the boot it gets tight but once you break them in it gets a little better. Very comfortable and light too. Overall feels great and looks clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy T

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats; real and authentic
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats; real and authentic. Bought these for my 12 year old son, and he loves them. They are 100% real, and have the flyknit and ACC written on the inside of the shoe. It also comes with the blue magista stringbag.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

product_meta.title: Nike Unisex Adults’ Magista Obra 2 Pro Df Fg Ah7308 080 Football Boots
feature_bullets: Shaped Dynamic Fit collar links the lower leg and foot without impeding motion. 3-D texture is amplified on the high-use areas of the foot.
Rotational zone in the forefoot is ideal for quick turns and agile playmaking. Interior heel counter cups the foot for cushioning and a locked-down fit.
Molded, perforated sockliner provides lightweight cushioning.
Rotational zone in the forefoot provides agility for quick pivots and sudden changes in direction
